response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to purchase this product for $1,400,000. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the product, which I am confident will meet and exceed your expectations. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, and I aim to provide a fair and mutually beneficial transaction. Should you decide to accept this offer, I assure you of a smooth and efficient process. If you need more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
